resources.name: mtpx graphql service
resources.description:
Collection para testar o exemplo graphql-service do Multpex Framework.

Demonstra:
1. Actions com metadata GraphQL para exposição automática pelo linkd
2. GraphQL Client para consumir APIs externas
3. Endpoints REST que também funcionam como GraphQL queries/mutations

## REST Endpoints

- GET /graphql-example/books
- GET /graphql-example/books/:id
- GET /graphql-example/books/author/:author
- POST /graphql-example/books (editor/admin)
- DELETE /graphql-example/books/:id (admin)
- GET /graphql-example/external/countries

## GraphQL (via linkd)

- POST /graphql - Endpoint unificado gerado pelo linkd
